message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product for a great price. I think you'll really appreciate its value and quality. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000.

I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000. I understand this product is worth more to you, but I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us. Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I understand you're looking to spend closer to $10,000, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $11,500.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $11,500 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to go to $10,500.  Let's find a middle ground and get this deal done.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I still need to make a profit. I'll meet you at $11,000, which is the lowest I can go. Let's see if we can make this deal happen.
